name: LD38 - LoneGalaxy
description:
LoneGalaxy is a Ludum Dare 38 JAM HTML 5 game, made in one weekend as a two person team.

Deep in space there lives a small planet. On that small planet lived two tribes. They did not get along. One day they decide to take off into space, carrying everything they can on their ships. But of course they brought along all the finest fighters with them. Unable to escape the orbit of the their planet they decide to do the only thing they can, send their fighters out to takeout the other tribe.

Controls:

Player1: F - Shoot

Player2: H - Shoot

There is no sound sorry didn't get to it during the jam, but do leave a comment!
